messages.subject: THE AUSSIE AUCTION, AS PROMISED
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Blokes, The link to the website with the auction catalogue is http://www.australianarmsauctions.com/ Once there click on [  Catalogue A30 with photos - on
messages.messageBody:
Dear Blokes,

The link to the website with the auction catalogue is
http://www.australianarmsauctions.com/

Once there click on [ Catalogue A30 with photos - on line now. ]

Or just go straight to the swords.

Go here to find sword Lots 850 to 900:
http://www.australianarmsauctions.com/catalogue_online_9.htm

and here for Lots 901 to 924a:
http://www.australianarmsauctions.com/catalogue_online_10.htm

I would like to acknowledge the great help of luminaries on this list, both on and off-line. You know who you are - thanks. Any cataloguing errors are mine alone...

Best regards,
Barry Thomas.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
